A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it... I might be one of the few\, but I really appreciated the radical directions. Showing us some new things was exciting and I feel like it really worked. I'm glad this isn't just a retelling of the original story. I really liked a lot about this movie! Then again\, I didn't get into much speculation. Perhaps that is why I enjoyed this so much. I didn't have preconceived notions nor expectations about what should happen. Easily 5/5 stars for me.
